00051 int MSD_highAlteraCurrentCamera(char opt, real Ex, real Ey, real Ez,
00052                                 real Rx, real Ry, real Rz, real scale,
00053                                 int mode, int hidtype, int dash, int smooth)
00054 {
00055    CTYPE *cptr;
00056 
00057    if ((cptr = camptr) == (CTYPE *)NIL)
00058    {
00059       fprintf(stderr, MEN_NenhumaCamaraCorrente,
00060               NAM_AlteraCamaraCorrente);
00061       return(ERROR);
00062    }
00063    return(MSD_lowAlteraCamera(opt, cptr, Ex, Ey, Ez, Rx, Ry, Rz,
00064                               scale, mode, hidtype, dash, smooth));
00065 }
